properties.name: box.libs.metrics.reactive-timed.order
properties.description: Order of the ReactiveTimed aspect. Lower values have higher precedence.

properties.name: box.libs.metrics.reactive-timed.include-class-name
properties.description: Whether to include the class name as a tag in metrics.

properties.name: box.libs.metrics.reactive-timed.include-method-name
properties.description: Whether to include the method name as a tag in metrics.

properties.name: box.libs.metrics.reactive-timed.default-tags
properties.description: Default tags to include in all reactive timed metrics.
